anuradhapura yugayedi athiwunu pandukabhaya mutasiwa dewanampiyathissa yana sirilaka aarambhaka raja parapure milanga sihasuna urumakkaruwa wu mahanagata athiwu ghathana kumanthrranayak nisa dakunata pala aa mahanaga diwi gewa aththe me ramba wiharaye ohuge puth yatalathissa, gotabhaya kawanthissa dutugamunu yana aya gana apata dakunedi nohoth magampurayedi kathakarannata siduwenawa.
